abstract: The former Treasury secretary is expected to testify in Congress next month on his role in persuading Bank of America to complete its acquisition of Merrill Lynch.
snippet: The former Treasury secretary is expected to testify in Congress next month on his role in persuading Bank of America to complete its acquisition of Merrill Lynch.
lead_paragraph: Who could forget Henry M. Paulson Jr.? Certainly not the House Oversight and Government Reform Committee.

headline.main: Paulson to Follow Bernanke in House Hot Seat
